void TREX::initPlugin ()

Detailed Description

A simple plug-in providing a light-switch reactor.

This group embeds all the utilities provided by the lightswitch plug-in. This is a simple example of a TREX plug-in that provides the Light reactor

Author:
Frederic Py <fpy@mbari.org>

Function Documentation

void TREX::initPlugin (  ) 

Plug-in initialisation.

Method to be implemented for each plugin.

This function is called by TREX after loading the lighswitch plug-in. It manage the initialisation of this plug-in
